dedicatedCloud_USER_right_vsphere_ADMIN: Reserved for OVHcloud, for administrators only
dedicatedCloud_USER_right_vsphere_admin: Reserved for OVHcloud, for administrators only
dedicatedCloud_USER_right_vmNetwork_help: Management rights over the public network section (a.k.a VM Network in the vSphere interface)
dedicatedCloud_USER_right_vmNetwork_ADMI: Allows VMs to be configured on a public network
dedicatedCloud_USER_right_vmNetwork_admi: Allows VMs to be configured on a public network
dedicatedCloud_USER_right_vlan_help: Management rights over the private network section (VLAN for Essentials and Dedicated Cloud, and VXLAN for Hosted Private Cloud Premier and SDDC)
dedicatedCloud_USER_right_vlan_ADMIN: Allows VMs to be configured on a private network
dedicatedCloud_USER_right_vlan_admin: Allows VMs to be configured on a private network
dedicatedCloud_USER_right_vlan_MANAGER: Allows port groups to be managed on the virtual switch (creation, modification, deletion). For SDDC and Hosted Private Cloud Premier packs only.
dedicatedCloud_USER_right_vlan_manager: Allows port groups to be managed on the virtual switch (creation, modification, deletion). For SDDC and Hosted Private Cloud Premier packs only.
dedicatedCloud_USER_right_resources_help: Right to add additional resources through the OVHcloud plugin in the vSphere client.
dedicatedCloud_USER_right_set_success: The modification of {{t0}} rights for the {{t1}} datacenter has been confirmed
dedicatedCloud_USER_right_set_fail: An error has occurred modifying {{t0}} rights for the {{t1}} datacenter
